items.title: Campbell’s Soup gets a Gen X makeover — 42-year-old fashion exec joins her family at $9 billion canned-soup-and-snacks giant

items.title: Opinion | It’s time to invoke the U.S. Defense Production Act to support a new battery technology revolution
items.description: "Drone dominance" for the U.S. military means relying on China’s supply chains—but there’s an alternative.
